programs.name: Main Stage
programs.description: Our annual Cosplay Masquerade and raffles are held on the Main Stage in West Ballroom.

programs.name: Exhibitor Hall
programs.description: Browse fanmade merchandise drawn or designed by local artists in the Artist Alley, or check out items sold by industry vendors.

programs.name: Showings
programs.description: Performances and movie showings will be held in the Price Center Theater.

programs.name: Panels
programs.description: We have informational and interactive panels for your enjoyment run by students, alumni, and professionals. Check them out!

programs.name: Manga Library
programs.description: Relax and check out a book from Cal Animage Beta's library of donated manga.

programs.name: Gaming
programs.description: We have a Super Smash Bros. Ultimate tournament with prizes, brought to you by Triton Smash!

programs.name: Featured Activities
programs.description: Learn a craft with the Origami Folders club and try out the Cardfight!! Vanguard card game.
